title: American Sociological Review - Opting Out: Individualism and Vaccine Refusal in Pockets of Socioeconomic Homogeneity
itunes:title: American Sociological Review - Opting Out: Individualism and Vaccine Refusal in Pockets of Socioeconomic Homogeneity
description: Author Kevin Estep discusses his article, "Opting Out: Individualism and Vaccine Refusal in Pockets of Socioeconomic Homogeneity," published in the December 2020 issue of American Sociological Review.
